content.detailedDescription:
The levels of irony here are tearing me apart. i am a physicist and amateur astronomer also well versed with aircraft. i had just finished teaching a lecture on rocket science and the early history of nasa for my science class. i was supposed to bring my telescope to show the class jupiter and the moon, but forgot... this precise time is when i would have had the telescope setup and trained in that direction. i walked out of the building to the rear parking lot to go to my car. i looked up at jupiter and the full moon and saw two other bright objects near jupiter and immediately knew something was potentially odd. these two objects were not moving and were almost as bright as jupiter, clearly brighter than any visible stars from my view. the farthest one to the right was as far away from jupiter as jupiter was from the moon. the other one was about two moon widths away from jupiter. a total of about 2-3 moon widths was between the two bright objects. there was also a small cessna-like prop aircraft nearby in the sky as an excellent reference, its flashing wing lights (blue and red) were clearly visible, along with its silhouette. the buzz of the prop engine was also clearly audible. i watched these two luminous objects for about 20 seconds and thought they might be two airplanes headed right at me with their landing lights on, but they were not moving and the lights were not growing in intensity. due to their relative closeness to jupiter i had a perfect reference point to observe any motion and there was none. they did not blink or waver. i began to walk down the steps to the parking lot and they simultaneously began to fade out. if it had been aircraft that began banking, the lights on the front of the wings would have become obvious, as would blinking wing lights and tail lights. these were not visible. it took about 6 seconds for these two objects to dim to the point i could not see them, fading to an almost orangish looking ember. it gave the appearance of some bright spotlight that had been turned off and had a brief residual glow. i am near maxwell air force base there and they do fly f-16's from this base. however, there was no noise which would have been clearly audible given how close they would have to be for their landing lights to be so bright. they dimmed in near perfect unison and may have begun drifting in apparent position (i was still slowly walking down the steps at this point so this may have been an illusion from my motion aka parallax or they actually were moving away). 

the only rational explanation i can come up with would be that two f-16's were afterburning directly away from me with wing and tail-lights out and both cut-out their engines at the same time. this is still highly unlikely as i should have distinctly heard a sound.
content.summary: 2 motionless, luminous objects near jupiter, faded out to nothing

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog, looking at the halo of ice crystals in the air around the moon (signaling rain is coming) and just happened to look south from my deck and saw what looked like a bright light (maybe a satellite) to the south of my house, moving west to east. it was strange that there were no aircraft running lights, and there appeared to my eye to be several objects trailing the light. i went into the kitchen and got my binoculars, and found the object, which is moving much faster than a normal aircraft, given what looked like about 50 miles distance. i looked through the binoculars and saw about 5-7 yellowish, constant lights moving as though they were linked together. i believe that the object was quite some distance, possibly over the river valley since we get commercial planes flying overhead at about 30 thousand feet, and you can hear them. i heard no jet or prop noise, saw no running lights, or landing lights (must be over 10,000 feet agl) i lost sight of the object as it went behind trees in my neighbors yard. i went to the front yard but could not locate the object. there was an airplane to the east, which had running lights, and looked nothing like the object. my feelings were amazement, since i never believed i would see something like this.
content.summary: Line of lights moving quickly from west to east

content.detailedDescription: I went out to the back area under the pool cage to have a cigarette, and looking up at the moon and stars which is quite normal for me, when i noticed 2 bright stars to the right of the north star.... they struck me as odd at first because i don't recall ever seeing them before.... just as i was calling my husband out to look at them, one of the faded away, then the other faded away immediately after.  about 10 minutes went by and i noticed alot of air traffic in that same area, i.E. planes and helicopters.  (not sure if it was just coincidence).  anyways, i was left dumbfounded as i was not sure what to think about what i just saw... i was trying so hard to rationalize it, and i just couldn't, which is why i am here reporting it.  there was not a cloud in the sky at the time, planes i don't think can go that high (to appear like stars).... i don't know.....
content.summary: I saw what appeared to be 2 bright stars to the right of the north star

content.detailedDescription:
Well i was out side looking for wood for a bondfire and a night is star gazing when i looked up and seen 3 white lights in the sky right below jupeter at first i took a dubble take and seen a outline of a boomarang/triangle obgect with the lights on eatch corner of it moveing south at first i figured it was a strlth bomber doe to some are baced in mo but it was mutch bigger o would say atleast 100 feet from tip to tip and at about 10 thousend feet moveing slow to the south when i seen it i ran like a girl inside to get my gf to come see she could not cuz she had our baby in her arms feeding him when i went back out it was just about to go over the horison and seen it tell it went over the horizon i know i am not crazy and i know was not a plane i have worked for the airlines for 9 years i know a plane when i see one so if anyone else has seen this report it so i dont feel like i am going nuts thanks i have enclosed a scatch of what i have seen 
thanks
content.summary: Ufo over mo

content.detailedDescription:
I observed 2 stationary planet like objects of differing shades approximately half the diameter of presenty visable... jupiter......Just below and to the right of the moon at a distance of about 5 moon diameters...For about 3 minutes  while chatting on my  phone out on my deck for useable reception ...I noticed them because they should not have been there...They were absolutely motionless at too high an angle...Separation between the two was about one moon diameter... they were not plane landing lights...As i suspected at fist sight. i finished my call and went inside and grabbed my 10x 50's...Took less than 30 seconds...When i came back out....They were gone...

 i was pissed at myself for not reacting sooner as the seconds and then minutes passed... realizing they were motionless...With more and more certainty...The angle was just too high...

 if they were some kind of illuminated balloon... i thought i would have noticed some type of motion... wavering...Flickering,oscillation...Something......No....They were constant and seemed to be very distant. 

parachute flairs of different shades...Burning out  together is my best guess

 i was seeing something unusual...Did anyone else...?
content.summary: Observed 2 stationary planet like objects

content.detailedDescription:
I've had many sightings since age of 11, but this is the most extreme.  i lived on a farm by myself with my shih tzu.  i went into the south facing bedroom to start closing drapes for the evening and over the unoccupied farm next doow, hung a huge disc.  i was alarmed, but felt somewhat entranced even more.  it hung there with the colored lights around the center blinking.  the colors in these "windows" were primary colors.  i called friends who lived approx. 20 miles north, but who's house was up on a hill.  they could see it too over the tree tops.  it stayed for about 5 minutes then took off in a flash south towards the town.  it lowered straight down below the tree line.  i continued to watch and it cqme back to the farm next door and stayed for another 10 minutes or so, then headed slowly south until it was gone.  it did that for about 3 nights. one of those nights it went slowly over a semi-pro baseball stadium about 30 miles south while they were playing and was seen by those there.  it was reported to be a "meteor" by some "authority" in the paper the next day.  on the 3rd night of it's evening appearance, i had gone to bed around 10 p.M.  it was a queen sized bed and my little dog was on the right side near the foot.  all of a sudden i couldn't move.  i strained to break free and could not.  i vaguely saw some moving objects around me on three sides that looked like gargoyles to me.  i was terrified of the way they looked and kept trying to break loose.  one on the right put it's head lower towards me and then back again.  though scared almost to death, i felt nothing physical.  then they were gone, instantly.  i couldn't move my head but could cut my eyes over to my dog to see if she was aroused.  she was still sleeping undisturbed.  then they were gone and i broke free.  i was afraid i'd kick her and kept thinking about that, but i didn't.  i got up, grabbed her and went in the other room and sat up for the rest of the night.  something did happen, but i just can't figure out what.  i believe i was conscious throughout but couldn't swear to it. several days afterward, a black lincoln town car drove past the farm in the morning with about 6 men in black suits and black dress hats.  they all looked alike and were looking forward.  they came from the north going south on the dirt road that came out of the woods and turned into a hard surfaced road at the entrance to my farm.  they were so out of place in that location or even in town or in the nearby city, that they really stood out.  it's one of those things that's imprinted in your mind forever. that was years before i heard about "the men in black".

in the early 60's i also had an experience were i couldn't account for a space of time that has always haunted me. i've had a number of sightings and experiences that might be of interest to you.  i've never told anyone for obvious reasons.

if a third party is going to contact me, please have them email me in advance so i know to answer the phone.  i don't want to confuse them with a solicitor.  thanks.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disc higher on top with sq. windows (?) around center in primary colors

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a car with my cousin at the parking lot behind his house in merrillville indiana, we were facing south. we were both looking out the windshield. then we saw a bright bluish-white teardrop shaped thing float past us. it was unlike anything i've ever seen, definitely not a man made aircraft. it was almost like an orb, made out of energy or light, but it was shaped like a teardrop. it was very close, no more than 13 feet high and probably 100 feet away. a large flying object that close and with that shape and aura can't be some kind of man made aircraft. it only happened for about 3 seconds. i was so surprised and taken back by what i saw that i didn't even think to look at where the object was going. i just saw it float, not fly, but float past us. at first i thought i was "seeing things" but then i looked at my cousin and asked "did you just see that?" and he said, "yeah, bluish white?" right after we knew that what we saw was real and that it really did hapen, i called 911 and reported the sighting.
content.summary: Teardrop shaped unidentified flying object

content.detailedDescription:
My name is *(wit's name removed--cms/sg)  a 42 year old caucasian male. i was driving from covington la. to baton rouge la. about 20 miles before arriving in baton rouge i noticed traffic on both sides of the interstate braking and slowing down, the driver in front of me had his window rolled down and was pointing in the air. i looked up and saw a small white sphere just hovering in the sky. i pulled my vehicle over on the shoulder of the road and took a snapshot with my cell phone.( i do know that cell phones are not known for their clarity.) i got back in my car, turned on my hazard lights and took a look at the picture. what i saw startled me, not only had i gotton a picture of this small white sphere but some type of "craft??" off to the left by the treeline(i did not see this "craft" when i took the picture, only when i observed it when i returned to the car. there are a few strange features that i noticed in the picture upon closer observation. a very strange cloud formation that appears to have the shape of a perfect triangle with trails coming off of it. it also appears that there is an identical cloud, how do i word this, placed a little off center but over the other cloud. there is also another sphere apparently the same size and shape as the one that i saw initialy with my own eyes, to the bottom left of the craft and alson two more spheres in the center of the "craft" itself. i did not want to report this, just save it on my phone and show it to friends to get thier opinion. any call or meeting time would be fine with me. i am basicly computer dumb and have no idea how to attach this photo, but am happy to meet in person or by phone.

 thank you,
       
*(wit's name removed--cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Driving on i-12 to baton rouge, traffic slowed, left vehicle and took a snap shot

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette looking up at the stars because it was very clear out. i noticed a clump of 8 or more lights in the far distance and at first thought they were stars. then the lights started moving in and out from the center light, but they were jumping instead of actually moving(best way i can describe it). my neighbor came outside to smoke a cigarette, and i asked her to look at what i was seeing because i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me. she confirmed what i was seeing, and within 5 minutes we noticed that the group of lights were moving closer and closer to our location. she went inside to get her boyfriend, and he also saw what we were seeing. i tried to record it on my camcorder on my phone, but couldn't get it to show because it was too dark. my neighbors went in, and i sat on my front step watching it get closer and closer. then out of nowhere this very big black triangle glided from across the street and right over my other neighbors house only about 40 ft. in the air (heading towards the direction of the group of lights). it had absolutely no lights on it, and made no noise what so ever. i literally stared at it for about 5 seconds. it was moving slower than an airplane and i couldnt believe what i was seeing. i jumped up to try to keep watching it, but could no longer see it. it had white or grey markings on its bottom that were not numbers, or letters but half ring shapes. at first i thought it was like a stealth fighter, but it was moving entirely too slow, and made no sound what so ever. i know my eyes werent playing tricks on me because i was no further than 50 or 60 ft. away from it, and had to turn my head in order to follow it. i was very scared and banged on my neighbors window, but it didnt appear again. i continued to watch the group of lights for a little over an hour after the triangle appeard. they didnt move any further in the distance, but were very high, and almost above my neighbors house. this isnt my 1st encounter with unexplained objects and lights in the sky, or other things i have experienced as a kid, but it is my 1st time seeing the black triangle. i researched it online today, but some peoples description of it doesnt match what i saw. it was almost like it was made not to be seen in the dark. but i definently saw it, and am now a believer of these triangles.
I caught this image while on the computer. i noticed a triangle and what appears to be a squadron above it in the distance. this is significant due to all the sightings lately around the world!
content.summary: Browsing cctv website and caught triangle with squadron above in distance

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving a cafe (on monroe street between 11th and 12th) in west eugene after listening to music at approximately 9:45  approximately a dozen-or-so patrons were outside and one man said they were watching a ufo and pointed it out.  it was west of us in a small area of sky outlined by trees.  the shape and colors were not immediately distinguishable to me.  it was a full moon.  i saw a bright star and asked what that was.  someone said it was venus, and then the object appeared.  it was brighter than venus and maybe about 5 times the size in appearance and it appeared closer in.

i watched it for what seemed like 10 to 15 minutes moving about or meandering non-linearly.  it took me a few minutes to distinguish its shape, which looked like a plane with a neon body and neon orange wings that sometimes seemed to spin around the neon green body.  it was not very big and seemed to be as close in as a plane would be.  a young lady captured it with her cell phone camera and showed it to me, but the image on her phone was only an indistinguishable spec.

i immediately thought it was either a genuine ufo or a black ops maneuver.  i watched for it to dart about erratically, but it seemed to gracefully move or meander about and hover, occasionally disappearing behind the tree scape. i was very excited to see it, especially when it seemed to move closer and waved and beckoned to it, to no avail.  there were two young men standing beside me.  one commented that he thought it was an unmanned craft, and the other commented that he thought it was a remote-controlled glider and that he had seen something like it before.

when it disappeared behind the trees, everyone dispersed.  i walked west several blocks and, on my way home, i ran into a couple lingering, who explained that they were watching a ufo.  this was around 10:15 or so.  it was still there in the same general area as before, only from where i was standing it was more up overhead and slightly to the east of where i was standing.  i only saw it briefly at that time before it disappeared behind the treeline, and a large low-flying plane became visible, which the three of us speculated was patrolling the sky for the object we had just seen.

i was surprised at myself and my feelings of actually wishing it would land.  for all the things i had heard about aliens being hostile, this was not what i was feeling.  i felt a strong desire to have contact with other intelligent beings in the universe.  at the same time, i was skeptical, and still am, that this could be a black ops, governmental, or some other kind of attempt at mind control.
content.summary: Plane-shaped object with neon green body and neon orange wings-like shape that seem to spin around sometimes

content.detailedDescription: Was getting a ride home with my friend melanie from work when i noticed more strange lights.  when she dropped me off i saw the disappearing lights again and a strange red glowing thing so i took pictures.  the disappearing lights photographed as triangle shape, this is the 1st time i've seen the orb shaped craft.
content.summary: Saw triangle and illuminating orbs

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were standing outside at 6:08 pm in the sw suburb of chicago called oak forest when i noticed to the west 2 bright streaking objects heading west. we both said what are those. i figured they were high flying planes getting some type reflection off the setting sun. still they looked weird and i grabbed my phone and snapped 2 pictures before they disappeared behind the trees. you can see one object clearly while the second object which is directly below had just started to go behind the tree. i took 2 pictures about 7-8 seconds apart. the sun was setting and the moon was bright but in the eastern sky behind us.Never seen anything like it before.  i then witnessed an grayish blue airliner flying low heading south in the same patch of sky as the two objects.Here's the photos for what they're worth.
content.summary: Two bright objects heading west at high speed. sw suburbs of chicago

content.detailedDescription: Well we have 5 boxers one chiwinner one half boxer half hound in our family.It was getting to be about weewe time for them so out the door they went. i always go out with them. to make sure they stay on our land, and that is a choure. well i started looking up at the stars cause of the meteorites. ten minutes went by and thought i need to put them inside and grab my binos. i came back out with binos in hand and strated looking at some pretty lights in the sky when a strange light caght my right eye it was gold in color thou it did have red lights on aft at the pie cut out and made absolutly no noise. this veihical past by twice in 20minutes i went and woke up my teen age son for a wetness but it never came back.There are a lot of things i left out but if it becomes importent call me and i will fill you in. thanks for being here!
content.summary: Eliptic transparant gold color

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were visiting with my mother and my uncle near mena, arkansas the weekend of october 16, 2010. we were staying in a small camper on my uncles land, the door was facing the west where we had a good view of the treeline and the mountains in the beyond. at about 2 a.M. we were watching through the camper window (looking out to the west) and noticed a small cluster of red, blue, and green lights. the object seemed to be just above the mountains in the distance. flying in a circlular motion. after a few seconds it would seem to "jump" and begin flying in circles again. my friend had gone to bed but i stayed up to watch the strange object. i pulled the curtain back on another window in the camper, and looked toward the mountains in the northwest and noticed several green lights flying a darting around above the treeline in different directions. jumping up i opened up the door to the cool night in order to get a better look at them. then i woke my friend mike and told him what i had seen off in the northwestern sky. he got up and came to the camper door and we watched as the numerous green lights flew around and at time hovered above the in the night sky above the mountains. a couple times the hovering lights would seem to almost "drip" what seemed like a green light. mike was exhausted and after watching the display for 5 or 10 minutes he went back to bed. i was fascinated too excited to think about anything but watching the lights in the sky. i went into my uncle's house where i woke my mother and got my uncle's binoculars. my mother and myself walked out toward the camper and using the binoculars i got a better look at the green lights/objects. they were elongated hexagons and i could see lines that looked as if they formed some sort of panelling. my mother was sleepy, cold, and didn't have her glasses with her. after a few minutes she went back inside the house, back to bed. i stood outside watching them through the binoculars until i got cold, then i went back inside the camper and kept watching them through the westward facing window for about another 2 hours. just before dawn i noticed yet another object in the sky that looked at first like a star, except that it was moving and was far too big to be a star. looking at this third object through my uncle's field glasses i saw a white rounded octagonal object. i woke mike again. he looked at it through the binoculars, at first telling me it looked like a star he acknowledged at last that it was no star, handed the field glasses back and went back to sleep. in the predawn twilight i studied the white object until it disappeared off to the west into the sky. by this time the green lights had also disappeared and the first rays of the sun had begun to appear in the east. with my head filled with thoughts of the things i saw that night i went to bed. i tried to sleep but instead lay there thinking until finally drifting off to sleep around 10 a.M.
content.summary: 3 different kinds of ufo's that night from 2 am til dawn. the most memorable were the dozen or so bright green objects

content.detailedDescription: Links moved to additional evidence section
content.summary: Ufos  (not a sighting report--cms/sg)

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take my dog out and a reddish egg shaped object flew quickly over my head to the west south west.  it was not that big,  maybe 10ft by 6 feet and silent.  it moved very quickly.  i noticed it because my dog was looking at it.  it was surprising to see and it freaked me out for quite a few minutes afterward.
content.summary: Egg shaped object flew low over my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
On october 17, 2010, i was leaving xenia, ohio, to go to work in centerville, ohio. i was on state route 723 leaving bellbrook and entering centerville. at approximately 4:50 pm, my eyes saw something in the sky, and my first thought was a plane was on fire and it was going down. then i thought it might be a meteor. then i noticed a smaller object beneath the larger "falling" object. using depth perception and reference points, i was able to determine the "falling" object wasn't falling at all, but was in fact remaining stationary. the "smaller" object i first thought was a jet, the kind that leaves behind cloud-trails. it had a "flare tail" but it didn't leave any kind of cloud trail behind. it ascended at an angle and proceeded to travel rapidly up, beneath the larger object, and into the sky. the "falling flaming meteor" remained in the same position for the next 10 minutes, until i reached my job and turned a different direction, and lost sight of it. as i live next to wright-patterson afb, i dismissed it, but the following day i saw news footage of strange lights seen over el paso, and they were almost exactly the very same thing i saw on october 17th, only during the day instead of night. i was so disturbed by this that i contacted the dayton daily news, and considered contacting wright-patt afb, but decided not to. ddn couldn't confirm any other reported sightings. a co-worker tonight said they had explained away these multiple sightings, but an exhaustive net-search pulled up nothing. i'm not a ufo nut, and living next to an air force base, especially wright-patt, i'm used to seeing multiple aircraft of different types in the sky. i am able to identify them. this object was unidentifiable. i only made the effort to contact the newspaper after seeing the el paso video, which at that point profoundly disturbed me. i know what i saw wasn't normal.

i lost sight of the object while changing directions in my car and i was no longer able to keep eyesight on it.
content.summary: Resembled falling plane or burning meteor

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling east bound on adams ave. 
noticed 4 lights arranged in a cross shape all blinking at the same time, object was moving slowly and steadily in what looked like a northern direction along the coast (ortley beach/seaside area).  
while moving slowly northbound the lights stopped blinking all at once and then started blinking in an alternated pattern- 2 red at one time & then the 2 white would blink.  i observed this for approximatley 1 minute before i turned left on to harding ave travelling north, intrigued by the odd lights i looked to my right (towards the ocean) to see the lights and could not find them.  
for approximatley 2 stop signs (or maybe 45 seconds-1min)i did not see the lights, as i looked back up to the northern sky the lights were directly in front of me in teh direction of route 37.  they were still blinking in an odd pattern and the lights began to descend till i couldn't see them anymore under the treeline.  they appeared to be adjacent to high school east.
at first i thought it was a plane or a helicopter flying along teh coast line but the lights were clearly in a t shape, and all the same size & intensity.  if it was a plane it looked as if it would have to be flying on its side, but theres no way it could move from the ocean, over the bay, over 37 towards fischer blvd and be over high school east, let alone descend low enough to not be seen below the treeline, those trees are not that tall.
content.summary: Four lights (2 red-2 white) arranged in a cross or "t" shape blinking & shifts course suddenly

content.detailedDescription:
I became quite sleepy at about 5:30 p.M. and laid down. at about 5:50 p.M. i came out of my stupor to answer the ringing phone. it was my wife telling me she was going into the store for groceries, then she would be home directly. at this time it was still daylight.
we live beside monterey bay in california. our apartment is very close to the ocean and we have a limited view through the trees from our bedroom and deck. i could see that the marine layer (fog) was thickening with a very low cloud cover. really, a pretty normal day for around here. i did notice that it was very calm, not a breath of wind. 
the next thing that happened was our power browned out. my bedside lamp became very dim and the cable, internet and phone went off. yet our overhead lights came on, but were very dim. the lights would respond to the on/off switches, but would come on very dim, kind of glowing. i remember thinking that it must be a u.F.O. overhead, which was kind of a strange way for me to react. i lit a candle and decided that a transformer or something must have blown.
at roughly 6:10 p.M. my wife got home with the groceries. she was in a flustered state. she came into the bedroom and said "good, i'm glad to see the lights doing this here also." yet, ours was the only apartment in our building and complex (around 100 apartments with a pool and beautiful courtyard surrounded on 4 sides by the complex), that was experiencing any brown out. she noticed that our porch light was flickering but none of the others in our building was flickering, all were normal. then, she dropped the bombshell.
when she was in the grocery store, checking out, the lights browned out and the clerk lost the screen on her cash register. however, she was able to process our debit card though it took much longer than usual to go through. there were several people around and most remarked that it must be a brown out. she then got into our truck to come home.
in our neighborhood, you can go through the middle of town or drive right along the ocean. we almost always go the ocean way. as she got to lover's point, she saw what she perceived as a ball of fish stirring up the otherwise eerily calm water. so she pulled over to watch for dolphin, which is usually the first species to react and feed on a ball of fish. in face, it it usually the dolphin who round up the fish and force them to the surface. it is something we see quite regularly as we are avid ocean watchers.
suddenly, the water became completely calm much more rapidly than usual. by this time she was looking through binoculars that we keep handy in the truck. she saw the water calm, then a beam of what she described as pure light energy, similar to a laser, came up through the water at a 50 degree angle. this caused absolutely no disturbance on the surface of the bay. this light shot up and at the top of this beam, she saw an egg shaped object that was extremely bright, yet she said she could see the clouds through it. apparently it was clear yet solid, a bit like a light bulb. there was a very small space between the beam of light and the object. this beam and object were a vivid sea foam blue and the marine layer around it glowed a tangerine orange color she described as kind of like a halo.
then the object shot off to the north at a crazy rate of speed while simultaneously the beam retracted back into the water. both things happened in a split second and once again the water which the beam was entering was undisturbed. 
h
content.summary: Uso became ufo flying out of monterey bay. affected power grid

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to look at jupiter with my telescope about 8:30pm est. observing the moon then jupiter, was looking at the moons of jupiter and noticed a stat like object moving. time was about 9:00pm est. i focused on the object and noticed it was moving in a very strange manner. it was moving from one side of the viewing field to the other side in approximate 10 to 20 seconds and then up down and then back again. it even moved in full circles. i pointed my telescope at another star to see if my telescope was unstable and to see if another star was moving the same way and it did not. i called my wife to have a look to see if my eyes were playing tricks. she had seen the same thing i did. i only occasionally use my telescope when the weather is nice and i have never seen this before. it defiantly was not a satellite. this event lasted about 40 minutes. 
the areas i live in have reported including me ufo sightings in the passed. it was on the total lunar eclipse of 16 july 2000. i will be defiantly looking again tonight if the condition is right. i hope this helps you.
content.summary: Looking at  jupiter with my telescope . i spotted a star like object moving from one side of the viewing field  to the other in a matter of seconds. object stops then moves up and down then back the other way. seen this for 40 mis.

content.detailedDescription: On october 19, 2010 around 9:30 p.M. and 10:15 p.M. i was riding in the car with my best friend when i saw a circular, round, shaoed object in the sky. it had tons of lights at the base of the object in different colors. we live in an apartment complex and could see the object as clear as day! it was far up in the sky yet there was a relection of silver or metal coming from it. it was not an airplane, hellicopter or any other flying vehicle that i ever saw. i yelled to my best friend to "look"! she did. she was astonished like i was. as we were leaving the complex, the object began to take off, like a jet almost, then we lost sight of it. once we got to the intersection of dogwood drive and mcdonough dr. it appeared again from behind some business complexes near cracker barrel resturant. i was petrified! we continued to watch it as it disappeared again behind the darkness/clouds. it just went away. i believe that i/we saw a real ufo. i can not explain it...
content.summary: Ufo over the night sky in conyers, ga

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i are on vacation at a b&b on seneca lake ny.   we went out to sit by the lake to see the stars.  the moon is very bright and facing us to the east.   to the right is jupiter.  very few stars are showing due to the brightness of the moon.  i didn't see when they appeared but when i looked up again there were two bright stars (slightly dimmer than jupiter) to the right of jupiter.  i couldn't convice my wife that they were not stars but i've never seen them before so i told her to watch and they would go away.  about 20 seconds later they appeared to fade until they were gone. no movement or flashing of any kind.  just disappeared.  the lights were 45 degrees from each other - lower left light, upper right light.  there were other planes that flew through the area eventually and their movement could be followed for many miles and all had the typical flashing lights.

not a very spectacular sighting but i'm convinced.
content.summary: Two stars appear near jupiter - bright - fade to nothing

content.detailedDescription:
Wish i had a camera with video the ufo is back i'm in lansingburgh looking north west loos like a star but flashing different colors ! no i haven't smoked anything funny ,,,
im in my apartment i also seen the same thing on the 13th its sorta round looking flashing  blue green red and white lights zig sagging and up down movements last time it faded away im going to look at it again now ,,,, i will re post news if it changes
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: North west of troy

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were throwing the football and the object caught my eye because how fast it was moving. planes regularly come through the airspace in our neighborhood. this was moving at least twice as fast as any jet. the object was a bright white dot. best i can describe is a white m&m moving across the sky. weird!
content.summary: Fast moving small object

content.detailedDescription:
Around 7:45pm a lighted object appears fairly low in the northern sky. the object appears to be shimmering with the naked eye but when you look at it through binoculars it is red,green and white simultaneously and giving off a pulsating effect. this object slowly descends until it is out of sight which takes about 45 minutes to 60 minutes. also there are at least three other lighted objects,smaller but stationary, spread out in the sky but farther east of the afformentioned object. these three have the same colors and pulsating effect. a                                                                          1.Standing on porch looking at stars.                                                                     2.Shimmering effect.
 3.A star.
 4.Already did.
 5.A very strong desire to know what they are and to have other people see them.
6.The larger one descended out of sight and the smaller ones were visible for an extended period of time.
content.summary: Seen by my wife and i every clear night since october  8th through present. also showed them to our neighbor.

content.detailedDescription: What i saw what a craft of some sort, i would say the exact same as what was in the china ufo video except there was no light at the rear. it was producing the same type of vaporization type of contrails. could not have been more then 8000' elevation and las vegas is roughly 2000' where i was at. literally no more then 5 miles away either, no sound no noise what so ever. the only reason i was able to see the "contrails" is because the moon was in view behind it and lit it up. otherwise i believe it would have been invisible. this craft was literally passing right by the air force base. but it did not take off from the base, also it only had one light on it a solid white very dim light. it was also incredibly small. if it had been a fighter jet or something of that nature i would have seen the outline that's how close it was. i saw it moving from north to south on the eastern side of vegas along the "sunrise mountains". it crossed the entire las vegas sky from nellis air force base to past henderson in around 45 seconds. thats around 50-60 miles i would say before it was no longer in sight. if it had been a jet i would have heard the sonic boom or engine noise as fast as it was moving.
content.summary: Craft moving past nellis air force base (above) splitting atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: Can someone contact me about this. i would like to know if anybody else reported this. would be happy to give all details. *(wit's name and phone number removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: Redish orange egg shaped object about  24 ft long 18 ft wide passed about tree top level  at extremely fast speed silently dissapeared in about 2-3 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Last night at about 6:55 pm i was driving south up a hill in west seattle to visit a friend. it was a beautiful, clear night with a bright moon. as i crested the hill i noticed, through my left (driver's window), just below the moon in the se sky, three very bright stars - what looked like jupiter at the top and two equally bright stars just below and to the right and left of jupiter, forming a triangle with jupiter at the top. i was amazed, but had to glance away to the road ahead and a stop sign. as i turned left, i looked back up through my windshield at the moon, and in the few seconds that had transpired the two bright stars under jupiter had dimmed to half of their brightness and then were gone. i tried to rationalize - could they have been reflections through the window? airplanes flyng in my direction that turned away in unison? i have no idea what these two bright lights were, and how long they were there before i saw them, but i checked this morning and was excited that someone else reported seeing the same thing, albeit from another part of the country (mi). although that gentleman reports that the lights "dropped away" from jupiter before disappearing, i didn't notice them dropping, just fading, perhaps because i had turned away and was in a moving car. anyone looking up at the sky around 6:55 pst would have seen this amazing sight, so i'm surprised that there aren't more reports.
content.summary: Bright stars appear below jupiter

content.detailedDescription: I just dropped my dogs to run some coon and it was a clear night with a bright moon with jupiter just below. i looked down to my gps to see where my dogs were and than looked back up at the moon and noticed two bright objects appeared below jupiter forming a triangle. i immediately knew this was strange as i have been watching the moon grow over the last week and have not seen these objects before. i stood there sorta puzzled and than the objects started moving down from jupiter staying the same distance apart and fading away. i felt as though i was watching an x-files type show and as they dissapeared i got goosebumps. very, very strange but its nice to know others saw this!
content.summary: Saw two bright objects below jupiter forming a triangle with jupiter being the top
